stdout:
Table	Create Table
pending_changes	CREATE TABLE `pending_changes` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `personalId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `studentId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `entityType` enum('student','anamnesis','measurement') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `entityId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `fieldName` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `oldValue` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `newValue` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','approved','rejected') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `requestedBy` enum('student','personal') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `reviewedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `reviewNotes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `pending_changes_personalId_personals_id_fk` (`personalId`),
  KEY `pending_changes_studentId_students_id_fk` (`studentId`),
  CONSTRAINT `pending_changes_personalId_personals_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`personalId`) REFERENCES `SFH8sqABSCK5KntMvXXcPM`.`personals` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `pending_changes_studentId_students_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`studentId`) REFERENCES `SFH8sqABSCK5KntMvXXcPM`.`students` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
